title: The First Discworld Novels: The Colour of Magic and the Light Fantastic
description: Together in one volume, here are the first two Discworld novels, featuring Rincewind the wizard and his Luggage, Twoflower and innocent tourist and Cohen the Barbarian, the world's oldest and greatest hero. And not to mention Death, who's not so bad once you get to know him.
author: Terry Pratchett
